attributes.action: To stop the kennel club from  registering dog as colour not recognised
attributes.additional_details: I.e merle gene does not exist in bulldogs there for any wouldn't be pure breed  and registering is fraud and not only that it also brings with it helth, temperament and other issues  breed clubs have a breed standard which is made working with the kc to make the pedigree dogs the best thay can be so how can they allow this to carry on other than pure greed £££££ . Selling these as pedigrees is obtaining money by means of deception ( CRIMINAL OFFENCE) there not rare or exotic thay are cross breed
attributes.background: registration of pedigrees  as colour not recognised is un ethical the people and the kennel club are only in it for profit not the welfare of the breeds .  Done by unscrupulous breeders cross breeding dogs I.e merle gene does not exist in bulldogs

rejection.details: The decisions of the Kennel Club are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. You could write directly to the Kennel Club to raise this issue.
